scripts.install_dependencies: yarn && cd web/ && yarn && cd frontend/ && yarn && cd ../../
scripts.pm2:start: yarn build && pm2 start ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.pm2:restart: pm2 stop 0 && yarn build && pm2 restart ecosystem.config.js --env production
scripts.push:master: git add . && git commit -m "update code" && git push origin master
